noTemplateName.title: You didn't provided a template name.

templateNotFound.title: Unable to find a template with that name.

templateAlreadyExists.title: There's already a template with that name in this server!

channelMising.title: That giveaway template doesn't have a channel by default so you have to either provide it in this command using the options: `--channel` or `-c` or you have to edit that template.

durationMising.title: That giveaway template doesn't have a duration by default so you have to either provide it in this command using the options: `--duration` or `-d` or you have to edit that template.

nameMising.title: That giveaway template doesn't have a name by default so you have to either provide it in this command using the options: `--name` or `-n` or you have to edit that template.

winnersMising.title: That giveaway template doesn't have a amount of winners by default so you have to either provide it in this command using the options: `--winners` or `-w` or you have to edit that template.

noOptionsCreate.title: You must use at least 1 option to create a Giveaway Template!.

noOptionsEdit.title: You must use at least 1 option to edit a Giveaway Template!.

noTemplatesYet.title: There are no giveaway templates yet.
